com.simsilica.es.server

Class ComponentUsageTracker

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.simsilica.es.server.ComponentUsageTracker

  • public class ComponentUsageTracker
extends java.lang.Object
    Keeps track of a 'frame' of 'version' for any active entity ID + component type combination. Basically this is implementing a mark-and-sweep style usage tracking that the HostedEntityData will use to keep track of what's relevant for the client when sending updates.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ComponentUsageTracker() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.Long get(com.simsilica.es.EntityId id, java.lang.Class<? extends com.simsilica.es.EntityComponent> type)
      Returns the last stored version for the specified ID and type or null if there is no tracking for the specified ID and type combination.
      java.lang.Long getAndExpire(com.simsilica.es.EntityId id, java.lang.Class<? extends com.simsilica.es.EntityComponent> type, java.lang.Long current)
      Returns the last stored version for the ID and type, removing it if the last stored version is older than the current version.

      • getAndExpire

        public java.lang.Long getAndExpire(com.simsilica.es.EntityId id,
                          java.lang.Class<? extends com.simsilica.es.EntityComponent> type,
                          java.lang.Long current)
        Returns the last stored version for the ID and type, removing it if the last stored version is older than the current version. If there is no stored version then null is returned.
